flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Tracking, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View
whitebalancing: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine-tuning
imageformat: JPEG, NEF (RAW), NEF (RAW) JPEG, EXIF 2.3, DCF 2.0, DPOF ( Fine, Normal, & Basic Quality )
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.5x), No. Of Focus Points (39), Eye Point (17.9 mm)
dustreduction: Yes, Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
shootingmodes: Auto, Portrait, Child, Close Up, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Pet Portrait
display: 3 inch TFT LCD Monitor with 170 degrees viewing angle
